Question: How many balloons are there in total (popped and unpopped)?
Resulting Lesson: This is how you count balloons: u (1) O (2) u (3)... and keep going!

Question: Number popped?
Resulting Lesson: Count how many times u shows up. Pop goes the balllloooon...!

Question: Number unpopped?
Resulting Lesson: Count how many times O shows up

Question: Which number goes on top of the fraction?
Resulting Lesson: The top number is how many of the things are what you are looking for

Question: Which number goes on the bottom of the fraction?
Resulting Lesson: The bottom number is how many things total there are
